QuestData.Title: Mahka's Plea
QuestData.Description: I can't put him out of my mind, $n. Sometimes at night, I can hear his howls of rage and suffering, echoing across the plains. To imagine him out there, alone and in such pain...$B$BPlease, I must ask a favor of you. Go to Mankrik, and tell him to come see me.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Mahka at Firestone Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: I am sorry to ask this of you, but I want him to come here. He needs to leave that place of death...
